name: Seated Forward Fold
setup: Sit with legs extended and feet flexed; sit on a folded blanket if needed
steps: On exhale, hinge forward reaching toward feet or shins
Hold a comfortable stretch; breathe evenly
Exit slowly, stacking spine back up
cues: Keep belly soft and jaw relaxed
Micro-bend knees if hamstrings are tight
mistakes: Pulling on feet to force range
safety: Stay in mild–moderate stretch, not pain. Use strap around feet or bend knees to reduce strain.

prescriptionHints.notes: Use after training to downshift and restore.

joints.notes: Hinge first; avoid aggressive lumbar flexion.
